ResearchProjectDef.label: Hobbit Tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: Hobbits! Unlock Hobbit tools which can be used as weapons in a pinch: - Hobbit pitchfork - Hobbit anklebiter axe

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hobbit Swords
ResearchProjectDef.description: To most this is merely a fancy knife but to hobbits this is a proper sword built for war! Only the most adventurous of Hobbits even know these exist. Unlock proper Hobbit weapons: - Hobbit basket-hilted sword

ResearchProjectDef.label: Apparel of the Hobbit folk
ResearchProjectDef.description: Shorter that any other race in Middle Earth, and often comfortably rounded, Hobbits require special clothing. Unlocked comfortably sized Hobbit apparel includes: - Hobbit dress - Hobbit shirt and vest - Hobbit pants - Hobbit jacket - Hooded cape - Hobbit traveler's pack
